description:
***************************
Bug Fixed. I'm so sorry for the crush.
***************************

*****60 Countries TOP10*****
1024 HAS SWEPT THE WORLD !
"Can't let it go" - Review
"The Original ONE!" - Gabriele Cirulli

New Game Play is COMING!
Try this beautiful and addicted game, challenge your mind and imagination. From the kid to the king, grow your little characters, and try to make the final "2048"!

` Endless challenge from one simple game mode
` Swipe to play, easy to learn
` An endearing cast of little characters
` Colorful design for everybody
